<h3 id="X5880">X(5880)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(6) OF FUHRMANN TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a<sup>3</sup> - b<sup>3</sup> - c<sup>3</sup> + 2abc + b<sup>2</sup>c + bc<sup>2</sup> : :
<b><br>
X(5880) = 3*X(7) + X(8)
</b>
